==Japanese==

===Etymology===
[[自動]] ([[じどう]], ''[[jidō]]'') "[[automatic]]" + [[販売]] ([[はんばい]], ''[[hanbai]]'') "[[sale]]" + [[機]] ([[き]], ''[[ki]]'') "[[machine]]".

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-accent-common|n|じ|どうはんば|いき}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じどう はんばいき}}

# a [[vending machine]]; a [[slot machine]] (abbr. {{l|ja|自販機}})
